variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Nova Scotia 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 8.79% on the portion of income up to $30,507. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 14.95% on the portion of income over $30,507 up to $61,015. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 16.67% on the portion of income over $61,015 up to $95,883. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 17.5% on the portion of income over $95,883 up to $154,650. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 21% on the portion of income over $154,650. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_5 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all five brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
